official_title: A bill to convey all interests of the United States in certain real property in Sandoval County New Mexico to Walter Hernandez.

summary.text: Conveys all right, title, and interest of the United States in specified lands in New Mexico to a certain individual.

titles.title: A bill to convey all interests of the United States in certain real property in Sandoval County New Mexico to Walter Hernandez.
